text: The 61st Infantry Division (, 61-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army. ==Organization== *1st Brigade **241st Infantry Regiment **242nd Infantry Regiment *2nd Brigade **243rd Infantry Regiment **244th Infantry Regiment == Rank insignia == === Officer ranks === {| style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:5px; font-size:95%; margin: 12px 12px 12px 12px;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! Description ||colspan=7| Rank insignia as to the design 1904–1906 |- align="center" ! Shoulder straps ! 50px !! 50px !! 50px ! 50px !! 50px !! 50px !! 50px |- align="center" ! style="background:#ff8800; color:black;"| Rank designation | Polkovnik (en: colonel) | Podpolkovnik (lieutenant colonel) | Kapitan (en: captain) | Stabs-kapitan | Poruchik | Podporuchik | Praporshchik |- align="center" style="background:#cfcfcf;" | Rrank group !colspan=3| Shtab- ofitsery (en: staff officers) !colspan=4| Ober-ofitsery (en: upper, superior, or higher officers) |} === Non-commissioned officers and enlisted ranks === {| style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background- color:#f7f8ff; padding:5px; font-size:95%; margin: 12px 12px 12px 12px;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! Description ||colspan=9| Rank insignia as to the design 1904–1906 |- align="center" ! Shoulder straps ! 60px !! 60px !! 60px !! 60px ! 60px !! 60px |- align="center" ! style="background:#ff8800; color:black;"| Rank designation | Zauryad-praporshchik (generated from feldfebel rank) | Feldfebel | Starshy unter-оfitser (en: senior NCO) | Мladshy unter-оfitser (en: junior NCO) | Yefeytor (en: Private first class) | Ryadovoy (en: Private) |- align="center" style="background:#cfcfcf;" | Rank group !colspan=4| Unter-ofitsery (en: Non-commissioned officers) !colspan=2| Ryadovye (en: enlisted men) |} ==References== Category:Infantry divisions of the Russian Empire
title: 61st Infantry Division (Russian Empire)
